title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\Application
name: Application
description:
Resource that represents a job application record of a candidate.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Application

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required during application update. Resource name assigned to an application by the API. The format is "projects/{project_id}/tenants/{tenant_id}/profiles/{profile_id}/applications/{application_id}". For example, "projects/foo/tenants/bar/profiles/baz/applications/qux".

params.name: data.external_id
params.description: Required. Client side application identifier, used to uniquely identify the application. The maximum number of allowed characters is 255.

params.name: data.profile
params.description: Output only. Resource name of the candidate of this application. The format is "projects/{project_id}/tenants/{tenant_id}/profiles/{profile_id}". For example, "projects/foo/tenants/bar/profiles/baz".

params.name: data.job
params.description: Required. Resource name of the job which the candidate applied for. The format is "projects/{project_id}/tenants/{tenant_id}/jobs/{job_id}". For example, "projects/foo/tenants/bar/jobs/baz".

params.name: data.company
params.description: Resource name of the company which the candidate applied for. The format is "projects/{project_id}/tenants/{tenant_id}/companies/{company_id}". For example, "projects/foo/tenants/bar/companies/baz".

params.name: data.application_date
params.description: The application date.

params.name: data.stage
params.description: Required. What is the most recent stage of the application (that is, new, screen, send cv, hired, finished work)? This field is intentionally not comprehensive of every possible status, but instead, represents statuses that would be used to indicate to the ML models good / bad matches.

params.name: data.state
params.description: The application state.

params.name: data.interviews
params.description: All interviews (screen, onsite, and so on) conducted as part of this application (includes details such as user conducting the interview, timestamp, feedback, and so on).

params.name: data.referral
params.description: If the candidate is referred by a employee.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Required. Reflects the time that the application was created.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: The last update timestamp.

params.name: data.outcome_notes
params.description: Free text reason behind the recruitement outcome (for example, reason for withdraw / reject, reason for an unsuccessful finish, and so on). Number of characters allowed is 100.

params.name: data.outcome
params.description: Outcome positiveness shows how positive the outcome is.

params.name: data.is_match
params.description: Output only. Indicates whether this job application is a match to application related filters. This value is only applicable in profile search response.

params.name: data.job_title_snippet
params.description: Output only. Job title snippet shows how the job title is related to a search query. It's empty if the job title isn't related to the search query.
